profile.name: Aleksander Hovland
profile.bio: Computer Science student at Georgia Tech with strong software engineering internship experience. Proven ability to build production-grade pipelines in Node.js and TypeScript, develop AI-powered document intelligence tools using OpenAI and Azure, and create robust testing frameworks in Python. Strong foundation in algorithms, data structures, and cross-functional collaboration. Passionate about solving complex problems and delivering scalable, realworld solutions.
